text: lqd samie allah qawl alyhwd aldhyn qalu: 'iina allah faqir 'iilayna yatlub minaa 'ana nqrdh 'amwalana wanahn aghnya'. sanaktub hdha alqawl aldhy qalwh, wsnktb 'anahum radwn bima kan min qatl abayihim lanbya' allah zlmana wedwanana, wasawf nwakhdhhm bdhlk fi alakhrt, wanaqul lahum wahum fi alnaar yedhbwn: dhuquu eadhab alnaar almhrqt
